TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITestFilter

Docs.summary: Interface to be implemented by filters applied to tests. The filter applies when running the test, after it has been loaded, since this is the only time an ITest exists.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Pass(class NUnit.Framework.Api.ITest test) cil managed

Docs.param: The test to which the filter is applied
Docs.summary: Determine if a particular test passes the filter criteria. Pass may examine the parents and/or descendants of a test, depending on the semantics of the particular filter
Docs.returns: True if the test passes the filter, otherwise false
